bio.name: luji ramdhan
bio.description: Passionate about web development and new technology. I enjoy every process that makes something better.

educations.description: For three years, I learned many things about computers from the basics, until finally I focused on programming. lorem
To learn programming, I took several online courses on backend and front web development.
I chose to major in informatics engineering, also entered a coding club and focused on front end web development.

project.title: projects
project.description: These are some of my projects, some are made with other website designs and some are also made for practice, but all of them are made by me seriously.

design.description: These are some of my projects, some are made with other website designs and some are also made for practice, but all of them are made by me seriously.

contact.question: what's next?
contact.heading: get in touch
contact.description: Although i'm still learning, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
